Message:
When the last assailant
breathed their last,

I stood on deck,
untouched by even
the slightest drop of blood.

The ocean breeze
begins to cool my body
from the heat of battle.

Fighting is the only
thing I can do.

Aside from training
and growing stronger,
I know nothing.

But...what do I fight for?
And for whom?

No longer do I have
a place to call home,
let alone a reason for fighting.

The seagulls cry overhead,
and land approaches on
the horizon.

I drifted towards this new land,
drawn in by the wind and
the waves.
